RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Midi Convert
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Dac Chartrand, Marvin Tjon
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Converts a Renoise song into a MIDI file. Notes are grouped by instrument and exported per track. Creates "Export Song To MIDI..." in the File menu and "Selection:Export To MIDI..." in the Pattern Editor menu.
